meanings.definition: A North American diving duck with a distinctive sloping profile and a reddish head.
meanings.sent1: The canvasback gracefully dove into the water to catch its dinner.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful canvasback swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent3: Why did the canvasback bring a ruler to the pond? To measure the depth!
meanings.sent4: The canvasback moved through the water like a sleek arrow.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red head of the canvasback stood out against the blue water.

meanings.definition: A type of wild duck known for its excellent flavor when cooked.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious meal using canvasback as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: Hunters enjoy pursuing canvasback for their tasty meat.
meanings.sent3: Why did the canvasback bring a seasoning shaker to the party? To spice things up!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the roasted canvasback filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The canvasback dish was the highlight of the dinner party.

meanings.definition: A type of canvas used for painting.
meanings.sent1: The artist selected a high-quality canvasback for their masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The canvasback provided a smooth surface for the paint to adhere to.
meanings.sent3: Why did the canvasback refuse to hold the paintbrush? It was afraid of getting dirty!
meanings.sent4: The canvasback absorbed the vibrant colors, bringing the painting to life.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush glided effortlessly across the canvasback.
